rules.ruleString: (Must be enrolled in course owned by {50000568} and Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 07, 07G, 07PG, 11, 42, 50PG, 76, 77, 78})

proh: Students must NOT choose a topic previously competed in PHC5304 or PHC5303
description: This unit has been created in collaboration with the Department of General Practice for students undertaking studies in ONE of the following five topics: Depressive and anxiety disorders in General Practice Mindfulness-based stress management Women's sexual and reproductive health in General Practice Child health Dermatology.Students undertaking this unit must choose only one topic. Each topic is equivalent to 6 credit points.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
